definition: a round fastener sewn to shirts and coats etc to fit through buttonholes, to fasten with buttons
details:
noun
- a round fastener sewn to shirts and coats etc to fit through buttonholes
- any artifact that resembles a button
- an electrical switch operated by pressing
= example: an electrical switch operated by pressing
= synonyms: push
- a device that when pressed will release part of a mechanism
= synonyms: release
- a female sexual organ homologous to the penis
= synonyms: clitoris, clit
- a round flat badge displaying information and suitable for pinning onto a garment
= example: a round flat badge displaying information and suitable for pinning onto a garment
- any of various plant parts that resemble buttons
verb
- to fasten with buttons
= example: to fasten with buttons
- to provide with buttons
= example: to provide with buttons
